title: Tourism Website
description: Developed tourism website where users can browse through the content, videos and images of popular destinations

title: Food Munch
description: Developed a responsive website for Food Store where users can see a list of food items, detailed information about food item.

title: Todos Application
description: A comprehensive todo management tool, user friendly interface with CRUD capabilities, crafted to simplify task management.

title: Jobby App
description: The Jobby App is a job search application that allows users to explore job opportunities by navigating through various routes.

description: The Nxt Trendz - Cart Features project is an e-commerce application focusing on implementing cart functionalities.

title: GitHub Profile Visualizer
description: The GitHub Profile Visualizer project is a React application that allows users to search for GitHub profiles and view their repositories.
